评论概述: Great shirt for spring or fall.
评论详情: Bought for my teenage daughter. I loved that the neckline isn’t plunged SO low. She liked the cute bow. Thin, great for spring & fall.
It’s super cute, the sleevs were a little bit too long, but if you fold them, they look fine.
It’s comfortable but the sleeves feel itchy. And the bottom of the shirt does ride up.
Most importantly, NOT see through. It’s flattering, super cute & super comfortable. Personally, I took the bow off & I like it even more that way.

This shirt is really pretty, and it feels soft and well-made while also being lightweight. I normally wear an XS, but I ordered a S to avoid the cropped look. I am pleased, and I definitely recommend it! It's a great year-round closet staple.
This top is so cute and comfortable, if it’s me perfectly and it’s so stretchy. But it also is so cute on.

This has a bow in the middle of the collar- which I did not notice in the initial picture I saw of it online. It’s still a cute very feminine top, cute under overalls or with high waisted pants. Sizing is true to size

Love the lace details and hemlines on this long sleeve shirt. It’s super stretchy and soft. It’s more of a juniors sizing as opposed to women’s. I got a size large and it’s still a bit too small to wear out but I’ll use it for around the house. Wish they came in XL because I’d definitely order another in a size up. For reference I’m 5’4” and 145lbs and usually a medium in shirts.
This top is super cute and the material feels so soft. The color is very nice and I love the little bow
Runs about a size too big
Very cute shirt. Soft material very comforable stretchy material. Great for lounging or as a undershirt. Good quality.

评论概述: True to size and true white🤔🥰👍🏻
评论详情: Order your regular size if you want a looser fit then order up one size. This is mostly cotton so it’s nice and soft and very stretchy and the sleeves are long enough. I like it a lot😉 I think it’s a good value only con would be that there’s a few loose threads but nothing Terrible🥰👏

The top is decent as an undershirt or a shirt for layering. I washed it as soon as I got it, & there’s a few strings hanging now, as shown in the picture. The top is soft and very lightweight. The neckline is wide, as pictured.
It’s definitely a baby tee but it’s soft and fits well, very cute.
